## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                    | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------ | --------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Whether the button is disabled | `boolean` | `undefined` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                        | Description                                              |
| --------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--button-active-bg-color`  | Background color in active state (default: primary-dark) |
| `--button-bg-color`         | The background color for the button (default: primary)   |
| `--button-border`           | The border for the button (default: none)                |
| `--button-border-radius`    | Border radius for the button (default: 3px)              |
| `--button-color`            | The color of the button text (default: white)            |
| `--button-cursor`           | The mouse cursor for the button (default: pointer)       |
| `--button-disabled-opacity` | Opacity of button in disabled state (default: 0.4)       |
| `--button-font-family`      | Font family of the button text                           |
| `--button-font-size`        | Font size of the button (default: 14px)                  |
| `--button-hover-bg-color`   | Background color in hover state (default: primary-dark)  |
| `--button-line-height`      | Line height of the button (default: 20px)                |
| `--button-padding`          | Padding of the button (default: 4px 12px)                |
